quest.name: Fishing in the Rain
journal: Sisipu would have you assist with a request of some importance.

A representative from the Brugaire Consortium has come to the Fishermen's Guild, drawn by your growing celebrity. Sisipu directs you to speak with the representative in person, who can enlighten you on the nature of the Consortium's request.

In an effort to satisfy the needs of wealthy Ul'dahns, the Consortium seeks five raincallers, which are said to possess certain desirable properties. Raincallers can be fished out of Gridania's Jadeite Flood with stem borers, but only when rain falls, hence their name. Procure the fish and deliver them to Sybell.

Sybell appears elated at receiving her raincallers, and at the prospect of seeing you again in future.

※The next fisher quest will be available from Sisipu upon reaching level 45.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: Just the fisher I was hoping to see! Uncanny timing, as always.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: The celebrity you've achieved has resulted in more obscure requests than I know what to do with! Your dunefishing escapades in particular have raised eyebrows.

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: The truly eccentric requests I've seen fit to turn away, but who can say “no” to the Brugaire Consortium?

dialogue.name: SISIPU
dialogue.text: I, for one, cannot, but perhaps you'll have something else to say when you speak with Sybell. She's waiting for you outside the guild.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, I take it? The legends said you were svelterugged, but failed to mention how voluptuousdelectable you are, as well. I have no doubt that our time together will be advantageous to us both.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: To business, then. I want you to bring me raincallers from Gridania's Jadeite Flood. However, there's a catch to this catch.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: The raincallers spend most of their time lying dormant on the bed of the water, active only when the rains come.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: Keep an eye to the skies─you'll need the fish to be aroused, so that they'll bite at the bait. Stem borers are most effective, or so I am told.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: As to why we want them, well... The fish are prized by wealthy Ul'dahns for possessing certain...properties.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: And it is the custom of the Brugaire Consortium to fulfill unconventional needs and desires.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: Five raincallers are all we require to satisfy these aristocrats' needs.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: Bring us five raincallers from Gridania's Jadeite Flood. We will make it worth your while.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: I knew you were the right lasslad for the job! Who else could deliver such rare and virile specimens?

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: These will suit the Ul'dahns' purposes quite well.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: The elder males have been led to believe that ingesting the raincallers will endow them with...let us say “vigor.” No one knows whether it is true, and I don't personally care to find out.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: I only know that rich men will stop at nothing to recapture their former glory, and so these fish should fetch a fair price at market.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: Speaking of “fetching,” I'm quite impressed with your handiwork, Forename. The Consortium will be pleased.

dialogue.name: SYBELL
dialogue.text: Of course, you've pleased more than just the Consortium. I look forward to seeing more of you.
